channel.title: Adding music to my client
channel.description:
i need help adding music to my client.. i dont mean music for diffrent areas, like moparscape client.. music that is in all ways in the background of the client.. i whant there to be a ''next track'' button and ''play'' and ''pause'' any suggestions? (im using the distant lands client)
maby this is to complicated? :confused:
